title: New: Spring King – City
content:
Spring King are the sort of that band that make you want to be in a band.

Energetic, endearing, and full of passion, their latest offering ‘City’ is a further development of the band’s raucous, uplifting sound. Led by lead vocalist, and drummer, Tarek Musa, the Manchester four piece are very quickly evolving into one of the UK’s most exciting guitar bands.

Out on Handsome Dad Records on April 20th, ‘City’ forms part of the band’s latest EP and has been announced alongside the band’s SXSW attendance and a UK support tour with Courtney Barnett.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
